Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • Movement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Movement
extends Object
implements Serializable
    represents the movement of an object that starts at a specified position and rotation, moves at constant velocity to a specified end position and rotation, then stops
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Point2D.Double endPos
      position at end of this move
      private double endRot
      counterclockwise rotation in radians at end of this move
      private long endTime
      time that this move ends, in milliseconds after the simulation started
      private Point2D.Double startPos
      position at beginning of this move
      private double startRot
      counterclockwise rotation in radians at beginning of this move
      private long startTime
      time that this move starts, in milliseconds after the simulation started

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Movement(Point2D.Double pos, double rot)
      Basic constructor.
      Movement(Point2D.Double newStartPos, double newStartRot, long newStartTime, Point2D.Double newEndPos, double newEndRot, long newEndTime)
      constructor that sets all instance variables to specified values

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean arrived(long time)
      returns whether specified time is past end time
      Point2D.Double calcPos(long time)
      returns position at specified time
      double calcRot(long time)
      returns rotation at specified time
      Movement freeze(long time)
      returns Movement object frozen at current location
      static Movement fromAngularSpeed(Point2D.Double newStartPos, double newStartRot, long newStartTime, Point2D.Double newEndPos, double newEndRot, double speed)
      alternate method to create Movement object that asks for angular speed (in radians per second) instead of end time
      static Movement fromSpeed(Point2D.Double newStartPos, double newStartRot, long newStartTime, Point2D.Double newEndPos, double newEndRot, double speed)
      alternate method to create Movement object that asks for speed (in position units per second) instead of end time
      Point2D.Double getEndPos()
      getter for endPos
      double getEndRot()
      getter for endRot
      long getEndTime()
      getter for endTime

      getter for startRot
      double getStartTime()
      getter for startTime
      Movement moveToAtAngularSpeed(long time, Point2D.Double newEndPos, double newEndRot, double speed)
      returns Movement object starting at current location and moving to final location at a specified angular speed
      Movement moveToAtSpeed(long time, Point2D.Double newEndPos, double newEndRot, double speed)
      returns Movement object starting at current location and moving to final location at a specified speed
      Movement moveToAtTime(long time, Point2D.Double newEndPos, double newEndRot, long newEndTime)
      returns Movement object starting at current location and moving to final location at a specified time
      Movement offset(Point2D.Double trans, double rot)
      returns current Movement instance offset by specified translation and rotation
      Movement offset(Point2D.Double trans, double rot, long time)
      returns current Movement instance offset by specified translation, rotation, and time
